column1: What do you call a drummer who just broke up with his girlfriend? homeless
column3: homeless can mean lacking a home and can also imply a person without a stable relationship
column4: The homeless man sought shelter from the cold winter night.
column5: After the breakup, he felt emotionally homeless, as if he had lost a part of himself.

column1: What was romeo and juliets favorite fruit? cantaloupe
column3: cantaloupe can refer to the fruit and a play on cant elope, linking to their forbidden love
column4: She served fresh cantaloupe at the picnic, complementing the savory dishes.
column5: Due to their differences, they realized they couldnt elope as others had expected.

column1: What do you call a masturbating cow? beef strokin off.
column3: beef refers to the meat from cattle, and can also be a slang term for complaints or conflict
column4: The butcher prepared several cuts of beef for the weekend barbecue.
column5: They often had beef over trivial matters, resulting in heated arguments.

column1: What do you call a pony with a cough? a little hoarse!!!
column3: hoarse can describe a rough or strained voice and can also refer to the animal horse
column4: After shouting at the game, he woke up with a hoarse voice the next morning.
column5: The horse galloped across the field, showcasing its strength.
